author: stsp
msg: On the 1.6.x-r37953 branch, merge a NULL-dereference fix made in r37953.
This merge is not tracked, because r37953 made more changes to this and
other files, which we might want to backport eventually. The change is
trivial and taken verbatim, so it should not conflict with future merges

author: stsp
msg: Remove 1.6.x-r37953 branch, it has changes I don't want to backport after all.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39729, fix the 'tree conflicts: tree missing, leaf del'
test by adding a temporary api for checking on working copy obstructions.
Note that this class of obstructions will be gone once we move to a
Also mark the remaining merge test failure XFail, until further

author: julianfoad
msg: Add batons to svn_stream_t's line-filter and line-transformer callbacks,
because every callback should take a baton.
remove_leading_char_transformer): Add a 'baton' argument (but don't use it).
(line_filter, line_transformer): Pass the stream's baton to the callback.
(line_filter, line_transformer): Add a 'baton' argument (but don't use it).
